review: The Fire TV Stick exceeded by expectations. Setting up the Fire Stick was easy. The variety of movies, TV shows is awesome. Very, very satisfied.
author: Satisfied Shopper

review: Love it. It's fast and simple
author: Nolan

review: So easy to set up right out of the box. Started using it in less then 10 minutes.  Can't believe how many channels available.
author: pvarize

review: Works great.  I can which Netflix and Prime without buying a new smart TV.
author: Paul Ma

review: Works great. Smooth playback, great layout, fun games. Enables easy use of Prime features online and is easy to move from TV to TV. Would definitely recommend.
author: Greg Pardo

review: Fire stick arrived on time & is well worth the purchase!!
author: npeach1

review: We have had this for a couple of months now but for some reason  the remote does not work anymore. If it were not for the APP on our cell phones we would not be able to use the Fire Stick.
author: HMM
